data.title: The Miracle: Recomposed by Shawna Edwards
data.meta_description: The “grown-up” version of “The Miracle” with a new 3rd verse honoring the miracle of His love.
data.text:
EASTER COLLECTION

The Miracle | Recomposed

“The Miracle: Recomposed” is, as my good friend calls it, “the grown-up version” of the song. Yes, I want to do all I can to help children come to know that Jesus died for them. But as life progresses, we need to remember that He will walk beside us and heal our wounds at any age. To depict this truth, I added a new 3rd verse (see below).

Lyrics

*New 3rd Verse*

I know he will walk beside me

And heal my wounds and calm my troubled heart.

Always there to bless and guide me.

My psalm at night my bright and morning star.

His love and grace will never end,

Each day they start anew.

My name is graven on His hands,

And yours is too.

YouTube Comments

My Doctor says l don't have much time left and listening to your songs warms my heart. l don't know much about God but I do thank you for your songs. l really needed to hear something great.

- Alan Clark

Your songs are mine and my kids' favorites! We play them in the car & on the piano and get so excited when a new one comes out. My 3-year-old son with Autism belts out entire verses (with actions) of the song "I will shine" and it's about the sweetest thing I've ever seen. The song The Miracle is my 6-year-old's favorite and the song that introduced us to your music!

Thank you again for blessing us all with your talents.

-Michelle Glaittli

Absolutely Beautiful and heavenly. Very beautiful voices. I love your songs, Shawna. You are so talented. This is my favorite song. It makes me shiver. I love it.

-Naomi Dobrescu
